DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess impact structure intervention and/or free distribution condom pre-travel consultation sexual risk behavior young person travel alone .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Brief Intervention and/or Distribution Free Condoms During Pre-travel Consultation Sexual Behaviour Abroad
DOC.detailed_description: All person age 18 - 45 year plan travel alone attend travel clinic Medical Outpatient Clinic Lausanne ask participate . The subject randomize three group : 1. intervention , 2. free condom without explanation , 3. structure intervention 5 minute STI risk reduction plus free condom . The structured intervention include information number traveler engage new sexual relationship , different type STI prevalence different country population group . The subject complete pre-travel questionnaire prior medical consultation . A post-travel questionnaire send 10 day trip . The questionnaire include question demographic characteristic , sexual habit , alcohol/tobacco/marijuana consumption sexual relationship trip .
DOC.criteria: Age : 18 40 year Travelling without regular partner Refusal patient participate
